title: Matchmaking Balance Problems
body: Anyone else feel like since new (not very improved, whole other topic) draft mode, match making has been heavily one sided? I dont get a fair, balanced game.. not one since release. One sided domination in my favor and against me... is it maybe since it's been implemented people started coming out of the woodwork to play again??? Cause holy *explicit* this game is not fun when it's one-sided mayhem. *explicit* RITO!!!

replies.body:
Same thought.
Level 22 and at least 1 plat / diamond player almost every game..
I can keep up with them but still.. Diamond bs lvl 22?? Wtf..
Hey, unranked here, been playing with diamonds/challengers for several years, it was and is always like this.

They haven't changed matchmaking at all.

Any change was due to other factors.

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eKyFdIQ1,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-18T18:06:02.908+0000)
>
> They haven't changed matchmaking at all.
> 
> Any change was due to other factors.

^ This.

 MMR has not been reset or changed.

I'm Silver V, yet in many games I've been matched with high Gold, low Plat, and on 2 cases even a diamond player, all while playing with Silver friends? And in some games I've been matched against under 30 players. This is just a guess, but I believe the new system haso a new MMR that was set to 0 by default so it will take a couple weeks before everyone gets back to normal.
Yes. Yes. Yes. Our Bronze 1 ranked team has been matched against a team with a Plat or Diamond 5 out of the last 9 games. Not fun at all

I've noticed a ton of lolskill win changes around 56%+, which is highly unusual. Normally they're in the 50-52% range. I would suggest there is significant deviation, which might be because of queue times and role selection.

Maybe, not sure, the longer you stay in queue the more likely your match will be "unfair".

Yeah almsot all of my games feel like that now. I would say about 1/4 games maybe even 1/8 is sort of even. Sort of. However, once a team gets a solid lead the snowballing effect it has on either team just makes it so one sided. 
However, all games start 0-0. It's your job to make it in your favor.
